#   Registering an Application for Access Token:
*   [Offical Instructions](https://www.instagram.com/developer/authentication/)

1:  Log into [Instagram Developer](https://www.instagram.com/developer) and click 
    "registration application"

![Developer Site Registration](./Instagram Report/Pictures/AccessToken_1.jpg)

2:  Register the application and fill in 4 fields. 

![Application Registration](./Instagram Report/Pictures/AccessToken_2.jpg)


3:  Click on manage the application that was just created and 
    the _client ID, client status and client secret_ are all listed there.
    Also click on _security_ and uncheck _disable implict OAuth_.

![Application Data](./Instagram Report/Pictures/AccessToken_3.jpg)

4:  Follow the instructions on the offical instruction website, 
    the _Client-Side Sever_ instructions to retrieve the access
    token. 
    +   The request: `https://www.instagram.com/oauth/authorize/?client_id=1c5a8f81e7424f83be2e72d8d2e0847e&redirect_uri=http://127.0.0.1&response_type=token`
    +   [Acess Token Website](https://elfsight.com/service/generate-instagram-access-token/)
    
    
```{r InstagramKey}

    instagram_Key = "4811430802.b4d28d2.92ac9c87c49448a2a166f09e9c7dc06d"

```    
    
*   Cant guarantee that the user token is always available.
